alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:28PM CDT until June 06 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BLAINE AND EAST CENTRAL THOMAS COUNTIES... At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Halsey, or 16 miles west of Brewster, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Halsey. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 226 and 234. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
